synopsis.text: Two versions of the anime unfold the tale of Hina Saotome, an ordinary woman unjustly imprisoned in the formidable Kokuyoku Prison. In this male-dominated penitentiary, Hina finds herself at the mercy of Aki Myojin, the stern yet captivating warden. Aki's unconventional methods of discipline leave Hina's body craving more, despite her initial reluctance. As she navigates through the warden's sadistic yet alluring dominance, Hina's heart may have already surrendered to his charm. The anime explores the intricate dynamics between Hina and Aki, as her body and soul are pushed to their limits in various settings within the prison walls. Will Hina ever prove her innocence, or will she succumb to the hypnotizing power of Aki Myojin?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
